Isi Ewu (English: Goat's head) bụ nri ọdịnala Igbo nke e ji isi ewu mee.
Ọ bụ nri Igbo bụ Nkwobi ma e wezụga na Isi Ewu bụ isi ewu ebe nke ikpeazụ bụ ụkwụ ehi
Ụfọdụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-ahọrọ isi ahụ dum n'otu oge mana iji belata mmiri achọrọ iji sie ofe ahụ, a na-ebipụ isi ewu ahụ n'ime iberibe ezi uche dị na ya.
Isi ewu, Calabash nutmeg nke a makwaara dị ka mkpụrụ Ehu, Onion, Potash, mmanụ nkwụ, akwụkwọ Utazi, Ugba chọrọ isi Isi Ewu soup
A na-esi anụ ahụ n'ọkụ ruo mgbe ọ dị nro n'ime ite; a na-ejikarị ihe na-esi nri n'ihi ike nke anụ ewu.
A na-agbakwunye yabasị, ihe na-atọ ụtọ, ose na nnu na mmanụ nkwụ siri ike nke e ji ngwakọta potash ọzọ mee kpamkpam site na ịgbakwunye ngwakọta potashi site na itinye mmiri na ya.
A na-agbakwunye isi ewu, ụbụrụ kewara (nke e ji ụrọ mee), Calabash nutmeg,ugba na mmanụ nkwụ siri ike mgbe nkeji ole na ole gasịrị.
Isi Ewu na-enye yabasị e bepụrụ na akwụkwọ Utazi mgbe emechara ya.
